mapper.sql: eso.id as id,eso.stock_order_no as stock_order_no,eso.operation_type as operation_type,eso.cause_type as cause_type,eso.refer_no as refer_no,eso.stock_order_status as stock_order_status,eso.src_warehouse_id as src_warehouse_id,eso.src_warehouse_position_id as src_warehouse_position_id,eso.target_warehouse_id as target_warehouse_id,eso.target_warehouse_position_id as target_warehouse_position_id,eso.owner as owner,eso.data_status as data_status,eso.remark asremark,eso.create_time as create_time,eso.create_user as create_user,eso.update_time as update_time,eso.update_user as update_user

esoe.id as equipment_id,esoe.stock_order_no as equipment_stock_order_no,esoe.equipment_id as equipment_equipment_id,esoe.equipment_no as equipment_equipment_no,esoe.data_status as equipment_data_status,esoe.remark as equipment_remark,esoe.create_time as equipment_create_time,esoe.create_user as equipment_create_user,esoe.update_time as equipment_update_time,esoe.update_user as equipment_update_user

esobm.id as bulk_material_id,esobm.stock_order_no as bulk_material_stock_order_no,esobm.bulk_material_id as bulk_material_bulk_material_id,esobm.bulk_material_no as bulk_material_bulk_material_no,esobm.data_status as bulk_material_data_status,esobm.remark as bulk_material_remark,esobm.create_time as bulk_material_create_time,esobm.create_user as bulk_material_create_user,esobm.update_time as bulk_material_update_time,esobm.update_user as bulk_material_update_user
mapper.select:
select order_main.*
ep.id AS equipment_product_id, ep.product_name AS equipment_product_name, eps.id as equipment_product_sku_id, eps.sku_name as equipment_product_sku_name, ebm.bulk_material_name as bulk_material_name
FROM ( select
ews.warehouse_name as src_warehouse_name,ewt.warehouse_name AS target_warehouse_name from erp_stock_order eso LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ews ON ews.id = eso.src_warehouse_id and ews.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ewt ON ewt.id = eso.target_warehouse_id and ewt.data_status = 1 where eso.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and eso.data_status = 1 ) order_main LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_equipment esoe ON esoe.stock_order_no = order_main.stock_order_no and esoe.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_bulk_material esobm ON esobm.stock_order_no = order_main.stock_order_no and esobm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_equipment epe ON epe.equipment_no = esoe.equipment_no LEFT JOIN erp_product ep ON ep.id = epe.product_id LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku eps ON eps.id = epe.sku_id LEFT JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON ebm.id = esobm.bulk_material_id
select eso.stock_order_no from erp_stock_order eso where eso.cause_type = #{causeType, jdbcType=INTEGER} and eso.refer_no = #{referNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and eso.data_status = 1

select order_main.*
ep.id AS equipment_product_id, ep.product_name AS equipment_product_name, eps.id as equipment_product_sku_id, eps.sku_name as equipment_product_sku_name, ebm.bulk_material_name as bulk_material_name
FROM ( select
ews.warehouse_name as src_warehouse_name,ewt.warehouse_name AS target_warehouse_name
from erp_stock_order eso LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ews ON ews.id = eso.src_warehouse_id and ews.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ewt ON ewt.id = eso.target_warehouse_id and ewt.data_status = 1 where eso.cause_type = #{causeType, jdbcType=INTEGER} and eso.refer_no = #{referNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and eso.data_status = 1 ) order_main LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_equipment esoe ON esoe.stock_order_no = order_main.stock_order_no and esoe.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_bulk_material esobm ON esobm.stock_order_no = order_main.stock_order_no and esobm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_equipment epe ON epe.equipment_no = esoe.equipment_no LEFT JOIN erp_product ep ON ep.id = epe.product_id LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku eps ON eps.id = epe.sku_id LEFT JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON ebm.id = esobm.bulk_material_id

select order_main.*
ep.id AS equipment_product_id, ep.product_name AS equipment_product_name, eps.id as equipment_product_sku_id, eps.sku_name as equipment_product_sku_name, ebm.bulk_material_name as bulk_material_name
FROM ( select
ews.warehouse_name AS src_warehouse_name,ewt.warehouse_name AS target_warehouse_name
from erp_stock_order eso LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ews ON ews.id = eso.src_warehouse_id AND ews.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ewt ON ewt.id = eso.target_warehouse_id AND ewt.data_status = 1
AND eso.create_time >= #{maps.stockOrderQueryParam.createStartTime}
AND eso.create_time <= #{maps.stockOrderQueryParam.createEndTime}
and eso.data_status = 1
LIMIT #{maps.start},#{maps.pageSize} ) order_main LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_equipment esoe ON esoe.stock_order_no = order_main.stock_order_no AND esoe.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_bulk_material esobm ON esobm.stock_order_no = order_main.stock_order_no AND esobm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_equipment epe ON epe.equipment_no = esoe.equipment_no LEFT JOIN erp_product ep ON ep.id = epe.product_id LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku eps ON eps.id = epe.sku_id LEFT JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON ebm.id = esobm.bulk_material_id
